marker.ph: /* function that takes function => iterator apply, conditional apply ... */
/* Func<int, int, bool> isOk = (a, b) => a < b; ... */
/* 1. Write a function that negates a given predicate: whenvever the given predicate ... */
/* 1. Write a console app that calculates a user's Body-Mass Index: ... */
/* run the program you've written, for example: ... */
